items.title: headaccessories are now displayed in the avatar
member list avatars : some avatars displayed the wrong image for an user
a lot of other fixes too
dailies buttons have now optical feedback
dailies & todos are now easier to tap
Quest-Text can now display the HTML correctly
Task filter drawer now closes when back button is pressed
eyewear and headaccessories are now displayed in the avatar
open the drawer with the hardware menu button
ticking one checklist item closes the checklist
fixed crash in party list when you arenâ€™t in a party
fixed issue where login failed when username contained space at the end
fixed issue where users could end up in an empty app without logging in
removed toast for internet connection status
